Package org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering

Contains clustering algorithms.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Clusterer<P,M extends Model>
    Base interface for clusterers.
    ClusterizationModel<P,V>
    Base interface for all clusterization models.
    WeightedClusterer<P,M extends Model>
    Support of clusterization with given weights.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer<T extends Matrix>
    The abstract class that defines the basic interface of Fuzzy C-Means clusterers
    BaseKMeansClusterer<T extends Matrix>
    This class is partly based on the corresponding class from Apache Common Math lib.
    FuzzyCMeansDistributedClusterer
    This class implements distributed version of Fuzzy C-Means clusterization of equal-weighted points.
    FuzzyCMeansLocalClusterer
    Implements the local version of Fuzzy C-Means algorithm for weighted points.
    FuzzyCMeansModel
    This class incapsulates result of clusterization.
    KMeansDistributedClusterer
    Clustering algorithm based on Bahmani et al. paper and Apache Spark class with corresponding functionality.
    KMeansLocalClusterer
    Perform clusterization on local data.
    KMeansModel
    This class encapsulates result of clusterization.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BaseFuzzyCMeansClusterer.StopCondition
    Enumeration that contains different conditions under which algorithm must stop.

Package org.apache.ignite.ml.clustering Description

Contains clustering algorithms.
